pages.text: $(2)Here are some useful commands added by this modpack or other mods. $(5)They can be used in every packmode without cheats enabled, if not specified.$()$(li)$(2)/purge$(): Clears all dropped items, might boost performance.$(li)$(2)/sampler gc$(): (Server side) Force Java to do a garbage collection to reduce RAM usage and boost performance. (Suggested in singleplayer)

$(li)$(2)/cleanmemory$(): (Client side) Force garbage collect (Shortcut in R-button menu) $(li)$(2)/forge tps$(): View server TPS (Tick per second), lower than 20 means server is laggy$(li)$(2)/backupsmod backup$(): Manually initiate a world backup$(li)$(2)/mca$(): A bunch of Minecraft: comes alive commands$(li)$(2)/deathcounter$(): Shows death leaderboard, you can also do this by right clicking with a death counter.

$(li)$(2)/suicide$(): Kills yourself, use when you're stuck $(li)$(2)/trash_can$(): Opens a big trashcan, when closing the interface all items inside will vanish.$(li)$(2)//$$(2)$(k)wussmode$(): Enter cheat mode and allows usage of commands.$(4) Needs OP permission and can't be undone$() $(li)$(2)/hidedeathquotes$(): Turn off random death quotes. $(li)$(2)/showdeathquotes$(): Turn on random death quotes.

$(li)$(2)/unlockallstages$(): Unlocks all game stages. $(4)Needs OP perms and cheat mode enabled$(li)$(2)/lockallstages$(): Lock all game stages again$(4)Needs OP perms and cheat mode enabled$(2)/stagelist$(): Lists all game stages that you have or have not$(li)$(2)/hidescoreboard$(): Hide the scoreboard (aka sidebar) $(li)$(2)/showscoreboard$(): Show the scoreboard
